1.content:
An old book have been found, the words written inside read out,

For those that are reading this then it means that I'm dead. Allow me to introduce myself, the name that I tell others is Jack Troop but that is only a lie. The true name, my birth name is Richard Maximo from the rich family that lives far, far away on an island known as Imail Downs.

I don't know why my grate, grate, great, great grandfather was place a curse on him by what my mother told me was by a witch.

What's the curse you ask? Well I didn't believe it myself when I first heard of it and according to my mother that only the one of the men of the Maximo family in every generation. It was I whom was effected by the curse, cause it I didn't, then those that are reading this will not know anything about my life.

What is the curse since those that are reading are still wondering then I might as well tell you, the family curse is that it slowly shrinks a man with the blood of Maximo. I lost three inches, since I've got this curse and my mother begged me to leave and never to return.

Why does she want me to leave well it because her family is the head of the Maximo and if word got out that I'm shrinking then it would bring shame to us. So on the night that I've left, I looked back at the mansion that I once grew up in, and left without looking back.

Since that is out of the way, I might as well begin my tale,

It was a cold night as I walked through open fields of Imail Downs, feeling every chill that went through my body. I kept on walking, following the light from the full moon. When I reached the very top of the field, I looked out and I could see a camp fire.

Thinking that I can get some warmth, I rushed myself down there which only took me about ten minutes to reach. As I got there I saw that it was a group of four young women, each one looked at me as I walked towards them.

“What you want?” asked one of the woman whom has white hair and gray eyes. “Oh I'm sorry to intrude but may I join your campfire as you see, its very cold out here” I answered. “Those are fancy looking clothes you have, you from here?” asked another woman with long blond hair and light blue eyes.

I thought for only a moment but to me felt like a life time. I didn't know if I should answer the truth or lie. I took a deep breath and answered, “No...I'm not from here, I'm a traveller”

“Oh really? What's a traveller like you doing out here?” asked the third woman with ginger hair and red eyes. “Well, I don't have any money and I've just got kick out of an INN not so far from here” I lied again. “I take it that you wish to sleep here for the night?” asked the fourth woman with long black hair and brown eyes.

“That would be nice” I said. “Is that alright girls?” asked the black hair woman as she looked at the others. The three of them smiled up at me and said it was alright. The four of them introduced themselves, the woman with white hair is Sheryl, the long blond hair is Lene, the ginger hair woman is Scarlett and the long black hair is Alair.

So I made my way to sit down near the fire to keep warm, not knowing that when I wake up I would be all alone but with only one of the four women waiting.

I woke up by the smell of egg and bacon, I opened my eyes and sat up and saw Sheryl with a frying pan with the food I spoke off cooking. “Morning” she said with a smile on her face as she spotted me getting myself up.

“Morning” I answered back as I rubbed my eyes to get the sleep out from them. Sheryl took out a plate, place an egg and slices of cooked bacon onto it and handed me it. “Thank you” I said as I took the plate from her.

As I was eating, I noticed that the other three women were nowhere to be seen. “They left” said Sheryl as she took out a plate for herself and put the rest of the egg and bacon on it. “I'm sorry?” was all I said when I looked at her confused.

“That look you had...the others have gone their own way” answered Sheryl as she began eating. “Oh...I thought they were your friends?” I asked as I began eating. “They are, we meet up every now and then. We planned the next get to gather which will be across the sea” answered Sheryl as she finished eating her breakfast.

“Why what's across the sea?” I asked pretending not to know the area. “Hmm, you really don't know this area do you? Okay then, across the sea is another island known as Dali, it is known for the home of the Witch of the Shade” answered Sheryl as I finished eating.

“Witch of the Shade?” I asked as I've herd of the name before. “You haven't heard about the Witch's War here at theses Twilight Islands?” asked Sheryl as she took the plate from me. “I heard stories about witches waging war with each other for something” I answered as Sheryl put the plates away inside the her rucksack.

“Well the war is over and it leaders are dead. Now then, I shall take my leave” said Sheryl as she stood up and put her rucksack on. Not wanting to be alone, I shot up and said, “Hay wait a minute” “Hmm, something a matter?” she asked as she turned round to face me.

“Can I travel with you?” I answered as I walked towards her. “You sure you want to travel with a merchant?” asked Sheryl as she looked down at me as I noticed that she was around five inches taller than me. “Please, I would really like to travel with you so that I can learn about theses islands” I answered. She smiled down at me with a nod.

And with that the two of us headed off towards the the island of Dali, home to the Witch of the Shade. As we were walking I noticed that my clothes are slightly big and I hope that my travelling companion wouldn't notice me shrinking.

We took the first boat that sailed us to the island which wasn't that long really. It only took us till twelve to reach the port of a town known as Fishing Roo. asked Alair as she noticed the expression on my face.

“I don't know what it is but...something feels” I said as Alair butted in, “Wrong” “Yeah” I said as I looked at her confused. “If that's the case then its best that we leave here” said Alair as she took a last bit of her breakfast and stood up.

“Not good” she said as she grabbed hold of me and hid behind a tree that was in the fields. As I was about to say something, Alair covered my mouth and pointed upwards. I looked up and saw a very strange looking bird flying around in circles.

After a few minutes, the bird flew away and Alair let my go of my mouth. “What was that about?” I asked. “Oh...I wish I didn't got you involved” answered Alair as she placed her hands over face. “What do you mean?” I asked as I looked at her with a worried look.

info.brief_description: Been born with a curse that slowly shrinks me
info.description:
Set within a fantasy world,

My family have been cursed by a witch many generations ago and since then, one man in every generation of my family name is effected by it. For those that want to know what that curse is, it slowly shrinks the men that it effects. Seeing as how I'm the only man of this generation, I'm cursed and my mother begged me to leave home to save her the shame. Well then, as I'm writing this, I might as well tell my story.

Characters

Main Character:
Richard Maximo/Jack Troop:
The only man in this generation of the Maximo family beacuse of it he now slowly shrinks. To hide his birth name, he goes by the name of Jack Troop and begins exploring the fantasy world in search of a way to break his family curse.

Richard/Jack's travelling companions:
Through out the story Richard/Jack will join up with of four travelling companions each one learns about the curse of Maximo that effects Richard/Jack.

Sheryl White:
First met Richard/Jack at a campfire, a travelling merchant that tries to con people into buying knock off items.

Lene Blond:
First met Richard/Jack at a campfire, a young witch is searching for someone and feels that Richard/Jack may help

Scarlett Ginger:
First met Richard/Jack at a campfire, a travelling thief that steal from the rich and give it to the poor

Alair Black:
First met Richard/Jack at a campfire, a street performer that ran away from the travelling circus whom wants her back

You can create your own characters but describe them. You can build on the characters listed here but keep it within reason.

Rules
-No toilet
-No Sudden shrinking down to very small size, save that till later chapters
-Richard/Jack can die at anytime, save that till later chapter
-Only female giants.
-No short adds unless choice chaps.
